name: Curse Breaker
description:
Try full screen if you can't see everything :) Roxie is cursed, all she has to do to break it is defeat 9,999 enemies to regain control of her full abilities...should be easy. Screenshot and share how close you get to breaking her curse!

Developed in 48 hours for the DMTK Game Jam 2020 by a team of 2 :)
